mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.case_id AS "caseId", a.notify_type AS "notifyType", a.year AS "year", a.seq AS "seq", a.party_name AS "partyName", a.content AS "content", a.launch_dept AS "launchDept", a.launch_date AS "launchDate", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tcase_decision( case_id, notify_type, year, seq, party_name, content, launch_dept, launch_date, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{caseId}, #{notifyType}, #{year}, #{seq}, #{partyName}, #{content}, #{launchDept}, #{launchDate}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE tcase_decision SET case_id = #{caseId}, notify_type = #{notifyType}, year = #{year}, seq = #{seq}, party_name = #{partyName}, content = #{content}, launch_dept = #{launchDept}, launch_date = #{launchDate}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
